description: Mobile techniques used by MazarBOT, ATT&CK software S0303 v1.1
name: MazarBOT (S0303)

techniques.comment: MazarBOT can intercept two-factor authentication codes sent by online banking apps.
MazarBOT is delivered via an unsolicited text message containing a link to a web download URI.
MazarBOT can send messages to premium-rate numbers.
